Package pacman.world

Class Summary
Dot A small dot, which Pac-man can eat, yielding ten points.
Energizer There are four giant dots per level, called energizers.
Entity An object in the level.
Fruit Fruits are bonus symbols.
Ghost Represents a ghost in the level.
GhostHouse A collection of tiles outlining the ghost house.
MovingEntity A moving entity in the level.
Pacman Represents Pac-man in the level.
Tile A tile of the world.
World World is the entire game board and the main class holding everything in the game.
 

Enum Summary
Coordinate  
GhostMode Ghosts can be in different modes, normally alternating between scater and chase.
